select count(1) from sys_role r
r.del_flag = 0 and r.role_name REGEXP binary #{roleName} and r.create_date >=str_to_date(#{createStartDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and r.create_date <=str_to_date(#{createEndDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
select from sys_role where role_id = #{_parameter} and del_flag = 0 limit 1

SELECT (CASE WHEN tmp.module_id is NULL THEN false ELSE true END) as checkFlag, m.module_name as moduleName,m.module_id as moduleId,m.parent_id as parentId, (CASE WHEN m.type = 1 then 'PC端' when m.type = 2 then '安卓端' when m.type = 3 then 'IOS端' else '全端通用' end) as type from sys_module as m LEFT JOIN (SELECT module_id from sys_role_module where role_id = #{_parameter}) as tmp on m.module_id = tmp.module_id ORDER BY level asc,module_type asc,orders asc
